scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,electron -c cyan,magenta "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run electron:dev"
scripts.electron:dev: wait-on tcp:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron .
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run bundle:python && electron-builder --dir
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run bundle:python && electron-builder
scripts.prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron .
